room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: Super fun! We were blindfolded and handcuffed to start in the Kidnapping Room. Definitely worth the money and always a good deal on groupon. Super friendly employees especially Zach

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: Me and my husband had a great time! We even decided to stay for a second game! The staff was very friendly!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: My group had so much fun! The staff is very kind.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: What an absolute blast! Our group was kidnapped :) Very fun, very challenging and a great alternative evening out. We will definitely be back with hopes of breaking out!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: I've done several escape rooms and this one (the kidnapping) was definitely one of the hardest I've done. It was a lot of fun though! M group and I wanted to do another one right after. It was great!
